Action.author: yacovm
Action.body: Jason would know for sure, as this is a channel config question, but - I think that manipulating the anchor peers requires a signature of the corresponding organization, so - it makes sense to first add the org and then add the anchor peers separately because I guess (usually) when you add an org, the existing organizations sign the transaction, and not the new organization.

Action.author: jyellick
Action.body: +1 ~yacovm , it's generally natural that the anchor peer update would be performed as a discrete step from the addition of the org. Adding an org to a channel is a decision of a quorum of members, adding an anchor peer for an org si a decision of that org.
